title: Competitive Landscape Baseline
scenario: Map a crowded market by linking competitor signals, product mentions, and partner overlaps to identify adjacency opportunities.
description: Baseline recipe for competitive intelligence using curated news and QA datasets.

pipelines.description: Extract organization and product entities from the dataset fixtures.
Build relationships between competitor mentions and partner references.
pipelines.query: MATCH (o:Org)-[r:MENTIONS]->(p:Product) RETURN o, r, p LIMIT 50

evaluationMetrics.description: Percent of target entities linked into the graph.
Signals that meet competitive alert thresholds.

successCriteria: Identify core competitors and adjacency clusters with minimal false positives.
Surface actionable partner overlap signals for analyst review.

runParameters.notes: Run against curated GOLDEN fixtures only.
